2001.name: Unknown
2001.short_solution: Your console is region changed. Join the Nintendo Homebrew Discord and request a SOAP transfer.
2001.long_solution: Your 3DS appears to be region changed. In order to restore eShop and NNID functionalities (such as Pok√©mon Bank) on Nintendo Network, join the Nintendo Homebrew Discord server and request a SOAP transfer mentioning this error code.
